records.description: Array of serviceInternalId + subscriptionLink objects of the requested requested records

quantity.description: Quantity of usage item that was used by the customer

errorList.description: A list of errors in a billable usage level

end.description: End date representing the end time of the usage item used by the customer

regionCode.description: The region code of where the usage that is reported was used

release.description: Release version of the usage item

context.description: A Map<String,String> that is persisted in IT and returned when getting the usage report - this attribute is for the service's use and is not being used by CSP or IT

start.description: Start date must be later than the subscription activation time

serviceInternalId.description: A service generated UUID that along with the subscription link, will be used as a unique identifier for the record reported. The subscriptionLink + serviceInternalId must be unique for each record

subscriptionLink.description: The CSP subscription link that the usage is reported on

rateItems.description: List of products that were requested to view their price
List of products that were requested to view their price

currencies.description: The currencies supported for this offer. Only payment methods of a currency that matches one of these will enable subscription creation

endDate.description: The offer end date (until when it is available)

services.description: The services available in this offer

subTenants.description: This attribute is a SKU attribute and is only relevant for some types of offers. Pass-through if returned from this API.

minimumQuantity.description: The minimum quantity possible to subscribe to this offer

RawUsageReportRequest.title: RawUsageReportRequest

notification.description: Notification callback api details. Will be called uprong report completion.

fileType.description: File type, default is V1. V2 supports SAP items without SKU

startTime.description: Start date from which the raw usage has to be fetched.

endTime.description: End date upto which the raw usage has to be fetched

subOrganizationIds.description: Sub-organization IDs for which to run the report. No ids will retrieve none. When null all sub-organization will be returned

pgpEncryptionSecret.description: PGP encryption secret that will be used to encrypt the generated report

RawUsageReportRequest.description: Request for raw usage report for master org and optionally sub-orgs

primaryCustomerNumber.description: The customer number that will be passed whenever a subscription status change request is made

serviceId.description: The serviceId of the created sid line - will be used when a subscription status change request is made

customers.description: The customers associated with the order

orgContextValidations.description: List of reasons why the promo cannot be activated on the specified organization. relevant for AVAILABLE promotions only

promotions.description: List with users and associated promotion codes

serviceDefinitionId.description: The promotions will be associated with the given user on behalf of the service.If the value is not set the promotions will be given on behalf of the user making the request. Required if called by a service.

records.description: Collection of records that were captured and processed in the capture usage API

message.description: Message returned by IT raw usage status api

timestamp.description: The time the record was reported

billableUsages.description: Collection of records that were captured and processed in the capture usage API

errorMessage.description: Error that occurred on a record level

tosSignedBy.description: The org owner who signed the tos. Will be deprecated - see JIRA ticket CSP-5976

info.title: Billing APIs

get.description:
With this API one can get the usage report on the request that was sent to CSP

| ----- | ----- | ---------- |

null

| Role | User Accounts | Service Accounts (Client Credentials Applications)  |
| ----- | ----- | ---------- |

| Read-only Operator | ✔️ | ✔️ |

| Role | User Accounts | Service Accounts (Client Credentials Applications)  |
| ----- | ----- | ---------- |
| All Roles | ✔️ | ✔️ |

With this API one can manage state of a subscription. Supported actions are activate, cancel, terminate.
### Access Policy:
| Role | User Accounts | Service Accounts (Client Credentials Applications)  |
| ----- | ----- | ---------- |
| Service Owner | ✔️ | ✔️ |

get.description:
With this API one can get a specific subscription
### Access Policy:
| Role | User Accounts | Service Accounts (Client Credentials Applications)  |
| ----- | ----- | ---------- |
| Organization Owner | ✔️ | ✔️ |
| Service Owner | ✔️ | ✔️ |
| Read-only Operator | ✔️ | ✔️ |
| Billing Read-only | ✔️ | ✔️ |
